fields.name: ICMP (Ping) Checks
fields.description: Checks if a device is online and how fast it responds using basic ping tests.

fields.name: TCP Service Checks
fields.description: Checks if services like HTTP, SSH, or MySQL are reachable and responding over the network.

fields.name: UDP Service Checks
fields.description: Checks if services like NTP or DNS are available and accepting data over the network.
